hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Nocturne of Shadow#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that ##Dodongo's Cavern## has #2# major items.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo Valley# is a foolish choice.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #Arrows (5 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Fire Trial Silver Rupee Inside Pillar

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the final prize of #the thieves' training# is #a Green Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Path Final Chest

GC (Maze).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that a #giant pot in the Shadow Temple# holds #a Piece of Heart#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that ##Zora's Fountain## has #4# major items.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that between the #crawl spaces in the Spirit Temple# chests contain...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Red Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Child Early Torches Chest

HC (Malon).text: They say that #Gerudo's Fortress# is on the path to #Phantom Ganon#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Domain# is a foolish choice.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say you can cut corners to get to your destination faster.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #the Lens of Truth#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: Did you know that the Kokiri Sword is as effective as Deku Sticks against Dead Hand?

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Strength Upgrade#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Sun Block Room Silver Rupee Left

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: I love to gossip! Wanna be friends?

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Green Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Bomb Bag#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# is on the path to #the Tower#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Bomb Bag#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #an Ocarina#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Fire Temple Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Invisible Spikes Silver Rupee Right

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Deku Tree MQ Before Spinning Log Chest

LW (Bridge).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Green Rupee#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that ##the Water Temple## has #3# major items.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that a #storm within Gerudo's Fortress# reveals the #Royal Family's Tomb#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the path to #Morpha#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Red Rupee# and #a Red Rupee#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.
